001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FlowAssembler;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FrameDecoder;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MessageReconstructor;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PacketSource;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PairingEngine;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PersistencePort;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ProtocolDetector;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
012import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.RawFrame;
013import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
014import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
015import java.util.ArrayList;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Map;
018import java.util.Objects;
019import java.util.Optional;
020import java.util.Set;
021import java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue;
022import java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue;
023import java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue;
024import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
025import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;
026import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;
027import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference;
028import java.util.concurrent.atomic.LongAdder;
029import java.util.function.Supplier;
030import org.slf4j.Logger;
031import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
032import org.slf4j.MDC;
033
034/**
035 * Executes live packet capture and protocol reconstruction, persisting message pairs in real time.
036 * <p>The pipeline decouples capture from persistence via a bounded worker pool so back-pressure is
037 * handled gracefully. Instances are not reusable; invoke {@link #run()} at most once.</p>
038 *
039 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
040 */
041public final class LiveProcessingUseCase {
042  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(LiveProcessingUseCase.class);
043
044  private static final double EMA_ALPHA = 0.85d;
045  private static final int DEFAULT_PERSISTENCE_WORKERS =
046      Math.max(2, Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors() / 2);
047  private static final int DEFAULT_QUEUE_CAPACITY = DEFAULT_PERSISTENCE_WORKERS * 128;
048  private static final int PERSIST_BATCH_SIZE = 32;
049
050  private final PacketSource packetSource;
051  private final FrameDecoder frameDecoder;
052  private final FlowProcessingEngine flowEngine;
053  private final PersistencePort persistence;
054  private final MetricsPort metrics;
055  private final Set<ProtocolId> enabledProtocols;
056  private final PersistenceSettings persistenceSettings;
057
058  private final int persistenceWorkerCount;
059  private final BlockingQueue<PersistTask> persistenceQueue;
060  private final List<Thread> persistenceWorkers = new ArrayList<>();
061  private final AtomicReference<Exception> persistenceFailure = new AtomicReference<>();
062  private final AtomicReference<Thread> runThread = new AtomicReference<>();
063  private final AtomicInteger queueHighWaterMark = new AtomicInteger();
064  private final LongAdder enqueueWaitNanos = new LongAdder();
065  private final LongAdder enqueueSamples = new LongAdder();
066  private final LongAdder persistNanos = new LongAdder();
067  private final LongAdder persistSamples = new LongAdder();
068  private final AtomicLong enqueueEmaNanos = new AtomicLong(Double.doubleToRawLongBits(0d));
069  private final AtomicLong persistEmaNanos = new AtomicLong(Double.doubleToRawLongBits(0d));
070  private final String workerThreadPrefix;
071
072  private boolean workersStarted;
073
074  /**
075   * Creates the live processing pipeline by wiring capture, flow assembly, and persistence ports.
076   *
077   * @param packetSource source of raw frames; must support {@link PacketSource#start()} and {@link PacketSource#poll()}
078   * @param frameDecoder converts frames to TCP segments when possible
079   * @param flowAssembler orders TCP bytes per flow
080   * @param protocolDetector detects protocols for new flows
081   * @param reconstructorFactories factories for protocol-specific byte-to-message handlers
082   * @param pairingFactories factories that convert message events to {@link MessagePair}s
083   * @param persistence sink for emitting message pairs immediately
084   * @param metrics metrics sink updated for capture, decode, and pairing events
085   * @param enabledProtocols subset of protocols to process; others are ignored
086   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
087   */
088  public LiveProcessingUseCase(
089      PacketSource packetSource,
090      FrameDecoder frameDecoder,
091      FlowAssembler flowAssembler,
092      ProtocolDetector protocolDetector,
093      Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<MessageReconstructor>> reconstructorFactories,
094      Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<PairingEngine>> pairingFactories,
095      PersistencePort persistence,
096      MetricsPort metrics,
097      Set<ProtocolId> enabledProtocols) {
098    this(
099        packetSource,
100        frameDecoder,
101        flowAssembler,
102        protocolDetector,
103        reconstructorFactories,
104        pairingFactories,
105        persistence,
106        metrics,
107        enabledProtocols,
108        PersistenceSettings.defaults());
109  }
110
111  /**
112   * Creates the live processing pipeline with explicit persistence worker settings.
113   *
114   * @param packetSource source of raw frames
115   * @param frameDecoder converts frames to TCP segments
116   * @param flowAssembler orders TCP bytes per flow
117   * @param protocolDetector detects protocols for new flows
118   * @param reconstructorFactories factories for protocol-specific byte-to-message handlers
119   * @param pairingFactories factories that convert message events to {@link MessagePair}s
120   * @param persistence sink for emitting message pairs immediately
121   * @param metrics metrics sink updated for capture, decode, and pairing events
122   * @param enabledProtocols subset of protocols to process; others are ignored
123   * @param persistenceWorkers number of worker threads handling persistence
124   * @param persistenceQueueCapacity maximum buffered message pairs awaiting persistence
125   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
126   */
127  public LiveProcessingUseCase(
128      PacketSource packetSource,
129      FrameDecoder frameDecoder,
130      FlowAssembler flowAssembler,
131      ProtocolDetector protocolDetector,
132      Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<MessageReconstructor>> reconstructorFactories,
133      Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<PairingEngine>> pairingFactories,
134      PersistencePort persistence,
135      MetricsPort metrics,
136      Set<ProtocolId> enabledProtocols,
137      int persistenceWorkers,
138      int persistenceQueueCapacity) {
139    this(
140        packetSource,
141        frameDecoder,
142        flowAssembler,
143        protocolDetector,
144        reconstructorFactories,
145        pairingFactories,
146        persistence,
147        metrics,
148        enabledProtocols,
149        new PersistenceSettings(persistenceWorkers, persistenceQueueCapacity, QueueType.ARRAY));
150  }
151
152  /**
153   * Creates the live processing pipeline with explicit persistence tuning.
154   *
155   * @param packetSource source of raw frames
156   * @param frameDecoder converts frames to TCP segments
157   * @param flowAssembler orders TCP bytes per flow
158   * @param protocolDetector detects protocols for new flows
159   * @param reconstructorFactories factories for protocol-specific byte-to-message handlers
160   * @param pairingFactories factories that convert message events to {@link MessagePair}s
161   * @param persistence sink for emitting message pairs immediately
162   * @param metrics metrics sink updated for capture, decode, and pairing events
163   * @param enabledProtocols subset of protocols to process; others are ignored
164   * @param persistenceSettings tuning parameters for worker count and queue behaviour
165   * @since RADAR 0.2-perf
166   */
167  public LiveProcessingUseCase(
168      PacketSource packetSource,
169      FrameDecoder frameDecoder,
170      FlowAssembler flowAssembler,
171      ProtocolDetector protocolDetector,
172      Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<MessageReconstructor>> reconstructorFactories,
173      Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<PairingEngine>> pairingFactories,
174      PersistencePort persistence,
175      MetricsPort metrics,
176      Set<ProtocolId> enabledProtocols,
177      PersistenceSettings persistenceSettings) {
178    this.packetSource = Objects.requireNonNull(packetSource, "packetSource");
179    this.frameDecoder = Objects.requireNonNull(frameDecoder, "frameDecoder");
180    this.persistence = Objects.requireNonNull(persistence, "persistence");
181    this.metrics = Objects.requireNonNull(metrics, "metrics");
182    this.enabledProtocols = Set.copyOf(Objects.requireNonNull(enabledProtocols, "enabledProtocols"));
183    this.persistenceSettings = Objects.requireNonNull(persistenceSettings, "persistenceSettings");
184    this.persistenceWorkerCount = this.persistenceSettings.workers();
185    this.persistenceQueue = createQueue(this.persistenceSettings);
186    this.workerThreadPrefix = "live-persist-" + Integer.toHexString(System.identityHashCode(this));
187    this.flowEngine =
188        new FlowProcessingEngine(
189            "live",
190            Objects.requireNonNull(flowAssembler, "flowAssembler"),
191            Objects.requireNonNull(protocolDetector, "protocolDetector"),
192            Objects.requireNonNull(reconstructorFactories, "reconstructorFactories"),
193            Objects.requireNonNull(pairingFactories, "pairingFactories"),
194            this.metrics,
195            this.enabledProtocols);
196  }
197
198  /**
199   * Runs the live loop until interrupted, persisting each reconstructed message pair via the worker pool.
200   *
201   * @throws Exception if any port fails during capture, decode, or persistence
202   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
203   */
204  public void run() throws Exception {
205    if (!runThread.compareAndSet(null, Thread.currentThread())) {
206      throw new IllegalStateException("Live processing already running");
207    }
208    MDC.put("pipeline", "live");
209    try {
210      boolean started = false;
211      long frameCount = 0;
212      long pairCount = 0;
213      startPersistenceWorkers();
214      Exception primaryFailure = null;
215      try {
216        packetSource.start();
217        started = true;
218        log.info(
219            "Live pipeline packet source started with {} workers and {} queue ({})",
220            persistenceWorkerCount,
221            persistenceSettings.queueCapacity(),
222            persistenceSettings.queueType());
223
224        while (!Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {
225          Exception failure = persistenceFailure.get();
226          if (failure != null) {
227            primaryFailure = failure;
228            break;
229          }
230
231          Optional<RawFrame> maybeFrame;
232          try {
233            maybeFrame = packetSource.poll();
234          } catch (Exception ex) {
235            if (ex instanceof InterruptedException ie) {
236              Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
237              break;
238            }
239            throw ex;
240          }
241
242          if (maybeFrame.isEmpty()) {
243            continue;
244          }
245
246          frameCount++;
247          Optional<TcpSegment> maybeSegment = frameDecoder.decode(maybeFrame.get());
248          if (maybeSegment.isEmpty()) {
249            metrics.increment("live.segment.skipped.decode");
250            continue;
251          }
252
253          List<MessagePair> pairs = flowEngine.onSegment(maybeSegment.get());
254          if (pairs.isEmpty()) {
255            continue;
256          }
257
258          for (MessagePair pair : pairs) {
259            if (Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {
260              break;
261            }
262            if (persistenceFailure.get() != null) {
263              primaryFailure = persistenceFailure.get();
264              break;
265            }
266            try {
267              enqueueForPersistence(pair);
268              pairCount++;
269            } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
270              Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
271              break;
272            } catch (IllegalStateException halted) {
273              primaryFailure = persistenceFailure.get();
274              break;
275            }
276          }
277        }
278
279        if (primaryFailure == null) {
280          primaryFailure = persistenceFailure.get();
281        }
282        if (primaryFailure == null) {
283          try {
284            flushPersistence();
285            log.info("Live pipeline flushed persistence queue after {} frames and {} pairs", frameCount, pairCount);
286          } catch (Exception flushFailure) {
287            primaryFailure = flushFailure;
288          }
289        }
290      } catch (Exception runFailure) {
291        primaryFailure = runFailure;
292      } finally {
293        shutdownPersistenceWorkers();
294        try {
295          flowEngine.close();
296          log.info("Live flow engine closed");
297        } catch (Exception flowCloseFailure) {
298          log.error("Failed to close live flow engine", flowCloseFailure);
299          if (primaryFailure == null) {
300            primaryFailure = flowCloseFailure;
301          }
302        }
303        try {
304          persistence.close();
305          log.info("Live persistence port closed");
306        } catch (Exception persistenceCloseFailure) {
307          log.error("Failed to close live persistence port", persistenceCloseFailure);
308          if (primaryFailure == null) {
309            primaryFailure = persistenceCloseFailure;
310          }
311        }
312        if (started) {
313          try {
314            packetSource.close();
315            log.info("Live packet source closed");
316          } catch (Exception packetSourceCloseFailure) {
317            log.error("Failed to close live packet source", packetSourceCloseFailure);
318            if (primaryFailure == null) {
319              primaryFailure = packetSourceCloseFailure;
320            }
321          }
322        }
323      }
324
325      if (primaryFailure != null) {
326        log.debug("Live pipeline terminating after {} frames and {} pairs due to failure", frameCount, pairCount);
327        throw primaryFailure;
328      }
329      log.info("Live pipeline completed; processed {} frames and emitted {} pairs", frameCount, pairCount);
330    } finally {
331      runThread.set(null);
332      MDC.remove("pipeline");
333    }
334  }
335
336  private void startPersistenceWorkers() {
337    if (workersStarted) {
338      throw new IllegalStateException("Live processing already running");
339    }
340    workersStarted = true;
341    persistenceFailure.set(null);
342    queueHighWaterMark.set(0);
343
344    for (int i = 0; i < persistenceWorkerCount; i++) {
345      Thread worker =
346          new Thread(
347              () -> {
348                var batch = new ArrayList<PersistTask>(PERSIST_BATCH_SIZE);
349                while (true) {
350                  PersistTask task;
351                  try {
352                    task = persistenceQueue.take();
353                  } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
354                    Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
355                    break;
356                  }
357                  if (task.poison) {
358                    break;
359                  }
360                  if (!persistTask(task)) {
361                    break;
362                  }
363                  int drained = persistenceQueue.drainTo(batch, PERSIST_BATCH_SIZE);
364                  if (drained > 0) {
365                    boolean stopping = false;
366                    int requeue = 0;
367                    for (PersistTask next : batch) {
368                      if (next.poison) {
369                        if (!stopping) {
370                          stopping = true;
371                        } else {
372                          requeue++;
373                        }
374                        continue;
375                      }
376                      if (!persistTask(next)) {
377                        stopping = true;
378                        break;
379                      }
380                    }
381                    batch.clear();
382                    for (int j = 0; j < requeue; j++) {
383                      persistenceQueue.offer(PersistTask.POISON);
384                    }
385                    if (stopping) {
386                      break;
387                    }
388                  }
389                }
390              },
391              workerThreadPrefix + "-" + i);
392      worker.setDaemon(true);
393      worker.start();
394      persistenceWorkers.add(worker);
395    }
396    log.info(
397        "Started {} persistence workers with {} queue capacity {}",
398        persistenceWorkerCount,
399        persistenceSettings.queueType(),
400        persistenceSettings.queueCapacity());
401  }
402
403  private boolean persistTask(PersistTask task) {
404    long startNanos = System.nanoTime();
405    try {
406      persistence.persist(task.pair);
407      recordPersistMetrics(System.nanoTime() - startNanos);
408      metrics.increment("live.pairs.persisted");
409      return true;
410    } catch (Exception ex) {
411      signalPersistenceFailure(ex);
412      return false;
413    }
414  }
415
416  private void enqueueForPersistence(MessagePair pair) throws InterruptedException {
417    PersistTask task = PersistTask.payload(pair);
418    Exception failure = persistenceFailure.get();
419    if (failure != null) {
420      throw new IllegalStateException("Persistence already failed", failure);
421    }
422    long startNanos = System.nanoTime();
423    try {
424      persistenceQueue.put(task);
425    } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
426      metrics.increment("live.persist.enqueue.interrupted");
427      throw ie;
428    }
429    recordEnqueueMetrics(System.nanoTime() - startNanos);
430    metrics.increment("live.persist.enqueued");
431    failure = persistenceFailure.get();
432    if (failure != null) {
433      throw new IllegalStateException("Persistence failed during enqueue", failure);
434    }
435  }
436
437  private void flushPersistence() throws Exception {
438    try {
439      persistence.flush();
440    } catch (Exception ex) {
441      metrics.increment("live.persist.flush.error");
442      throw ex;
443    }
444  }
445
446  private void shutdownPersistenceWorkers() {
447    if (!workersStarted) {
448      return;
449    }
450
451    log.info("Signalling persistence workers to stop");
452
453    for (int i = 0; i < persistenceWorkerCount; i++) {
454      try {
455        persistenceQueue.put(PersistTask.POISON);
456      } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
457        Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
458        break;
459      }
460    }
461
462    for (Thread worker : persistenceWorkers) {
463      try {
464        worker.join(TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(5));
465      } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
466        Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
467        break;
468      }
469    }
470    log.info("Persistence workers joined");
471    persistenceWorkers.clear();
472    persistenceQueue.clear();
473    workersStarted = false;
474    metrics.observe("live.persist.queue.highWater", queueHighWaterMark.get());
475  }
476
477  private void recordEnqueueMetrics(long waitNanos) {
478    enqueueSamples.increment();
479    enqueueWaitNanos.add(waitNanos);
480    updateEma(enqueueEmaNanos, waitNanos);
481    metrics.observe("live.persist.enqueue.waitNanos", waitNanos);
482    metrics.observe("live.persist.enqueue.waitEmaNanos", emaValueNanos(enqueueEmaNanos));
483    int depth = persistenceQueue.size();
484    metrics.observe("live.persist.queue.depth", depth);
485    updateQueueHighWater(depth);
486  }
487
488  private void recordPersistMetrics(long persistDurationNanos) {
489    persistSamples.increment();
490    persistNanos.add(persistDurationNanos);
491    updateEma(persistEmaNanos, persistDurationNanos);
492    metrics.observe("live.persist.latencyNanos", persistDurationNanos);
493    metrics.observe("live.persist.latencyEmaNanos", emaValueNanos(persistEmaNanos));
494  }
495
496  private void updateQueueHighWater(int depth) {
497    int previous;
498    do {
499      previous = queueHighWaterMark.get();
500      if (depth <= previous) {
501        return;
502      }
503    } while (!queueHighWaterMark.compareAndSet(previous, depth));
504    metrics.observe("live.persist.queue.highWater", depth);
505  }
506
507  private void updateEma(AtomicLong emaBits, long sample) {
508    while (true) {
509      long currentBits = emaBits.get();
510      double current = Double.longBitsToDouble(currentBits);
511      double next = current == 0d ? sample : (EMA_ALPHA * current + (1 - EMA_ALPHA) * sample);
512      long nextBits = Double.doubleToRawLongBits(next);
513      if (emaBits.compareAndSet(currentBits, nextBits)) {
514        return;
515      }
516    }
517  }
518
519  private long emaValueNanos(AtomicLong emaBits) {
520    return Math.round(Double.longBitsToDouble(emaBits.get()));
521  }
522
523  private void signalPersistenceFailure(Exception ex) {
524    metrics.increment("live.persist.error");
525    if (persistenceFailure.compareAndSet(null, ex)) {
526      log.error("Persistence worker {} failed", Thread.currentThread().getName(), ex);
527      Thread runner = runThread.get();
528      if (runner != null) {
529        runner.interrupt();
530      }
531    }
532  }
533
534  private BlockingQueue<PersistTask> createQueue(PersistenceSettings settings) {
535    return switch (settings.queueType()) {
536      case ARRAY -> new ArrayBlockingQueue<>(settings.queueCapacity());
537      case LINKED -> new LinkedBlockingQueue<>(settings.queueCapacity());
538    };
539  }
540
541  /** Queue types supported for persistence hand-off. */
542  public enum QueueType {
543    ARRAY,
544    LINKED
545  }
546
547  /** Persistence tuning parameters. */
548  public record PersistenceSettings(int workers, int queueCapacity, QueueType queueType) {
549    /**
550     * Normalizes persistence settings by clamping worker/queue values and defaulting the queue type.
551     *
552     * @param workers requested worker thread count
553     * @param queueCapacity requested queue capacity
554     * @param queueType desired queue implementation
555     */
556    public PersistenceSettings {
557      workers = Math.max(1, workers);
558      queueType = Objects.requireNonNullElse(queueType, QueueType.ARRAY);
559      queueCapacity = Math.max(workers, queueCapacity);
560    }
561
562    /**
563     * Derives persistence settings using the pipeline defaults.
564     *
565     * @return normalized persistence settings
566     */
567    public static PersistenceSettings defaults() {
568      return new PersistenceSettings(DEFAULT_PERSISTENCE_WORKERS, DEFAULT_QUEUE_CAPACITY, QueueType.ARRAY);
569    }
570  }
571
572  private static final class PersistTask {
573    private static final PersistTask POISON = new PersistTask(null, true);
574
575    private final MessagePair pair;
576    private final boolean poison;
577
578    private PersistTask(MessagePair pair, boolean poison) {
579      this.pair = pair;
580      this.poison = poison;
581    }
582
583    static PersistTask payload(MessagePair pair) {
584      return new PersistTask(Objects.requireNonNull(pair, "pair"), false);
585    }
586  }
587}
